name: Senior .NET Developer
description:
Our client provides intelligent information, software, and analytic solutions to manage risk and facilitate access to finance. They are a leading service provider worldwide and have established over 25 credit bureaus in over four continents, thus tangibly contributing to growing and strengthening economies.

They are looking for talented and motivated SW Developers to join the team in Prague who can hit the ground running and take their products to the next level. As a SW Developer, you will build a product that will redefine financial markets in over 30 countries and change the lives of millions around the globe.

What would you do?

  • Work with .NET Core 2.2, .NET Framework 4.7, Git, React, Akka, RabbitMQ, WCF, SQL Server, and CouchBase
  • Develop custom frameworks when available frameworks are not good enough for us
  • Solve interesting technical challenges, such as building high availability applications that must process large data sets fast

What makes you relevant for the role?

  • Deep knowledge of .NET and C#
  • Experience with MS SQL or Oracle
  • Strong command of the English language (both verbal and written)
  • Experience working in a development team using Agile methodology
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills paired with the ability to develop creative and efficient solutions
  • Understanding of databases and Big Data technologies would be nice to have

What would an interview process look like?

  • Initial Interview with Acamar representative followed by an online test
  • Interview with our client representative
  • When you are successful – welcome on board, and we will take care of the rest!
